channel.title: Drops [ PLEASE HELP! ]
channel.description:
I made a nice minigame but I have a problem - How do I make a certain monster to drop a certain item?
But not anywhere , I mean , Let's say I use kbd? So not every kbd , just the kbd in my minigame ( I have his X and Y )..
So how do I make the specific kbd IN MY MINIGAME drop a specific item?
Thanks alot , Danny :P

item.title: Drops [ PLEASE HELP! ]
item.dc:creator: @Red_Tapuah Red Tapuah
item.description:
@Red_Tapuah wrote:

I’m not 100% sure but its stabbingscape or combattscape based server.

I use npcdrops.cfg if it helps , and PLEASE answer I want to release the minigame ASAP

Read full topic

@si_force wrote:
